pull.title: fuzz: wallet, add target for `Crypter`
pull.body:
This PR adds fuzz coverage for `wallet/crypter`.

Motivation: Issue [27272](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/27272#issue-1628327906)


I ran this for a long time with Sanitizers on and had no crashes; the average `exec/sec` also looks good to me. However, I would really appreciate it if some of the reviewers could try it on their machines too, and give their feedback.

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with ðŸ‘Ž to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.

In addition to this and [`CoinControl`](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27902), I'm working on the `FeeBumper` and `Spend` files. The majority of my work in FeeBumper is finished, and I'll open a PR for it as soon as we reach a conclusion on this PR.
I'm currentlyÂ working on the Spend file, which should be finishedÂ this week or next, hopefully.

Thanks, @MarcoFalke and @brunoerg for the reviews.

- Moved `Encrypt/Decrypt` variables outside of `LIMITED_WHILE` and added two functions to update them regularly.
Forced pushed updating changes in PR [28065](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28065).

events.message: fuzz: wallet, add target for Crypter

events.body: Forced pushed fixing the Shadow variable issue.

comments.body: That's a no-op assignment due to the symbol shadow.
Thank you so much for noticing this. I don't know how I missed this.
